questions.question_text: Comprehensive term plan

This plan offers long-term coverage with a larger coverage amount. You can set the length for 10, 15, 20 or 30 years.

  • Lock in your price for the duration of your term
  • No physical exam
  • Add life insurance coverage for children
  • Waive your premium if you become totally disabled until age 652,4

questions.question_description: Weâ€™ll pay this amount to your listed beneficiaries when you pass.

questions.tooltip:
One rule of thumb for life insurance coverage is to multiply your individual annual income by ten. This is a rough guideline, but gives a good estimate.
You may also wish to include coverage to pay for a large debt such as a mortgage or student loan. Another high cost item to consider is savings for children to go to college.
If you have a lot of savings or other life insurance, subtract these amounts from your coverage calculation.
questions.question_text: Find the right coverage for you

max_value.error_message: Value must not be less than 1000000

min_value.error_message: Value must not be less than 200000

questions.question_description: Your premium amount will stay the same during your policy. After that, youâ€™ll be able to continue coverage at a new premium, adjusted every year for your age.

questions.tooltip:
In general, protect your loved ones for as long as they may be dependent on your income. Consider the following factors when selecting a term length:
  1. Number of years remaining to pay off large debts.
  2. Number of years until your children are grown and independent.
  3. Number of years until you plan to retire.
questions.question_text: Find the right term length for you

questions.question_text:
Now it's time to start your application and answer some questions about your lifestyle and health.

Please respond honestly and accurately. All your info will be verified and will be the basis for any insurance issued. Inaccuracies could result in delays or terminated coverage.

To save time, you might want to grab:
  • Your driverâ€™s license (if you drive)
  • Details about your beneficiary/ies
  • A method of payment

questions.question_description: Entering the information for your beneficiaries is a two-step process. First, enter the information of your primary beneficiaries below. Then, continue to enter the information of your contingent beneficiaries.

Add the names of the people or entities you'd like to receive the payout from your life insurance policy if you pass away. This can be one or more people, and you'll be able to decide on the allocation for each. Later, you'll be able to add contingent beneficiaries.

questions.tooltip:
Your primary beneficiary is the first person/people or entity/entities in line to receive the payout after your death.

If your primary beneficiary or beneficiaries die before you, then the payout will go to your contingent beneficiary and/or beneficiaries instead.

questions.question_description:
By submitting these documents, I acknowledge that I have read the statements and answers given in these documents in their entirety. I affirm that the information provided is true and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief, and I agree to the terms and conditions contained in the documents.

I understand that by clicking the "Sign and Submit" button, I electronically signed the documents, which is the equivalent of my handwritten signature. I am the person authorized to sign the documents I have electronically signed. I understand that until I submit these documents, my documents have not been accepted or received by the insurer.

questions.page_title: Your application has been submitted | Allstate Life Insurance
questions.question_text: your application has been submitted

have_questions.description:
Have questions?

Visit our FAQ
Email us at LifeProtection@allstate.com

questions.question_description: Your application is now under review. We will contact you via email about our decision and anything else that's required of you.

questions.question_text:
We're providing temporary life insurance coverage

Since the review process can take time, we're providing temporary life insurance coverage, in accordance with the terms of the Temporary Insurance Agreement. You can find out more about this in the application documents.

questions.response: Download
questions.question_text:
Download your application documents now

We take online protection seriously. For security reasons, your application PDF is only available to download for 30 minutes.
